message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident you'll find this a fair offer considering its worth.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer at $10,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $14,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still looking to keep the cost within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $11,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're able to consider.
